item.title: Rust/TypeScript Type Synchronization
item.author: sam@stelfox.net (Sam Stelfox)
item.description: I’ve been looking at integrating a React front-end with a Rust API server and one of the ongoing annoyances I encountered was keeping API types in sync with each other. I found a couple of options, the smallest and simplest one I liked was tsync. I try to keep my dependency lists small, and this crate is a bit of an odd duck as it is only really doing work as a build dependency.
